title: Rape. Part 2. Providing the proof
creator_credit: AIMS Instructional Media, Karen Smith, Richard Cullather and Richard Siegel
brief_description: Deals with the preservation of corroborating evidence in the investigation of rape. Offers information on procedures, the establishment of fact, the collection and analysis of demonstrative evidence, the chain of possession, identification procedures and protection for the victim.
creator_credit_for_label: AIMS Instructional Media, Karen Smith, Richard Cullather and Richard Siegel
